abstract: Charles D. Niemeier, the former chief accountant of the S.E.C.’s enforcement division and a member of the Public Company Accounting Board since its creation, is on his way off the board, as I noted previously.
lead_paragraph: Charles D. Niemeier, the former chief accountant of the S.E.C.’s enforcement division and a member of the Public Company Accounting Board since its creation, is on his way off the board, as I noted previously.
